GSP33nysu__4u:3830_0: evaṃ svamatena śrutiṃ vyākhyāya yatpareṣāṃ vyākhyānamādityamaṇḍale parameśvaramupāsīnasya
GSP33nysu__4u:3834: lokādhipatyaṃ vijñānaphalaṃ samuktamiti vyākhyānaṃ na yuktam /
GSP33nysu__4u:3837: uktaṃ pṛthak tacca puraiva yasmād ... // MAnuv_4,4.9bc //
GSP33nysu__4u:3840: yasmāt kāraṇāt tat lokādhipatyaṃ puraiva pūrvavākya eva ravibimbage harau cakṣurantargate ca pṛthak vibhāgenoktam /
GSP33nysu__4u:3841: ādityagataṃ prakṛtya“sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣye manuṣyakāmānāṃ ca'; iti /
GSP33nysu__4u:3847: bhagavaddharmo 'pi viduṣo bhavatītyaṅgīkāre ko doṣa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__4u:3848: tatkiṃ bhagavān svīyasarvalokādhipatyaṃ parityajya viduṣe dadātīti /
GSP33nysu__4u:3853: kiṃ caikasmai viduṣe dattasvādhipatyo magavānanyasmai (viduṣe) kiṃ dadyāt /
GSP33nysu__4u:3860: iti hi parameśvarasyocchabdaṃ nāmatvenoktvā tasya nirvacanaṃ kriyate“sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya udite'; iti /
GSP33nysu__4u:3883: tvapratyayaṃ cāpyatihāya naiva rūpeṇa teneti bhavedihārthaḥ // MAnuv_4,4.10ab //
GSP33nysu__4u:3888: bhave(devaṃ pa)dayaṃ parasyasyābhilāṣaḥ śrutistu na tathā vakti /
GSP33nysu__4u:3890: yadi vā(cā)munā rūpeṇātmanā, anena rūpeṇātmaneti padaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__4u:3901: bhavatyasāvityaṇuśabdamatra vihāya vākyāni bahūni doṣaḥ // MAnuv_4,4.10cd //
GSP33nysu__4u:3908: ayamasau bhavatītyalpaṃ śabdaṃ vihāya bahūni vākyāni prayuñjānāyāḥ śruterakuśalatvadoṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__4u:3909: nahi kaścidalpīyasā prayatnena siddhatyarthe mahāntaṃ prayatnamātiṣṭhamā(naḥ sadbhi)
GSP33nysu__4u:3911: kiṃ cātra parameśvaraḥ saguṇo vā vivakṣito nirguṇo vā /
GSP33nysu__4u:3920: ato jagadvayāpṛtimanta eva brahmādayaḥ pūrṇaguṇāḥ krameṇa /
GSP33nysu__4u:3933_1: nirupādhikaparamapremāspadaguṇagaṇaṃ puruṣottamaṃ paunaḥpunyena praṇamati- nama iti //
GSP33nysu__4u:3937: aśeṣaviśeṣaiḥ pūrṇā ye guṇāsteṣāṃ pradhānāśrayāya, bhakte mayyanukampādanukrośāt /
GSP33nysu__4u:3939: sadguṇānuvādenānupādhipriyatvaṃ tādātmyaṃ ca vidhīyata iti na punaruktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__4u:3941: yathā bhagavatsvarūpavijñānaṃ samastapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ tathā svasvarūpavijñānamapītyataḥ tadāviṣkurvannāha- yasyeti //
GSP33nysu__4u:3942: yasya trīṇyuditāni vedavacane rūpāṇi divyānalaṃ baṭ tad darśatamitthameva nihitaṃ devasya bhargo mahat /
GSP33nysu__4u:3943: vāyo rāmavaconayaṃ prathamakaṃ pṛkṣo dvitīyaṃ vapurmadhvo yattu tṛtīyametadanumā granthaḥ kṛtaḥ keśave // MAnuv_4,4.13 //
GSP33nysu__4u:3945: yasya vāyordevasya vedavacane baḷitthetyādāvalaṃ divyānyadbhutāni trīṇi rūpāṇyuditāni /
GSP33nysu__4u:3946: amunā vāyunāyaṃ keśave viṣaye granthaḥ kṛta ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__4u:3948: kīdṛśaṃ tasya mūlarūpaṃ kathaṃbhūtāni ca tāni trīṇi rūpāṇītyata uktam- baḍityādi //
GSP33nysu__4u:3949: yasya tanmūlarūpaṃ baṭ balātmakaṃ darśataṃ jñānarūpaṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__4u:3958: hubhṛñ bharaṇe, gamḷ gatau, ābhyāmasunpratyayo ḍicca /
GSP33nysu__4u:3964: na kevalaṃ mūlarūpamevaṃ kintu yasyāvatāreṣu nihitaṃ rūpamitthameva /
GSP33nysu__4u:3965: yasya prathamakaṃ prathamaṃ rūpaṃ rāmaviṣayāṇi vacāṃsi mūlarāmāyaṇādīni rāmavacāṃsi teṣāṃ nayaṃ nīyante śiṣyeṣu pravartyante 'neneti /
GSP33nysu__4u:3969: tasminkarmaṇyupapade kṣai kṣaya ityetasmāt āto 'nupasarge ka iti kaḥ /
GSP33nysu__4u:3984: bhagavatsvarūpapratipādanenaiva granthopasaṃhāraḥ samucita ityāśayavānnityāparokṣaṃ bhagavantaṃ sambodhya stauti- niḥśeṣamiti //
GSP33nysu__4u:3986: bhūtisvayambhuśarvādivandyaṃ tvāṃ naumi me priyam // MAnuv_4,4.14 //
GSP33nysu__4u:3995: na vaiduṣyabhrāntyā naca vacanacāturyakudhiyā na mātsaryāveśānnaca capalatādoṣavaśataḥ /
GSP33nysu__4u:3996: paraṃ śraddhājāḍyādakṛṣi kṛtimācāryavacasi skhalannapyetasmājjagati nahi nindyo 'smi viduṣām // 2 //
